typeSystemDescription.name: JCoRe File Multiplier Types
typeSystemDescription.description: This is a type system for usage with a CAS multiplier. It should not be included into the jcore-all-types type system. This particular type system holds a single URI that points to the resource that should be split into CASes by the multiplier.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.casmultiplier.JCoReURI
typeDescription.description: An URI pointing to a resource that should be split into separate CASes by a CAS multiplier.

featureDescription.name: uri
featureDescription.description: The actual URI to the resource to split by the CAS multiplier
